# gux-side-panel

See the code in the story.tsx file for an example of how to build this component using the `gux-side-panel`, `gux-panel-frame` and `gux-side-panel-button`.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                    | Type                | Default  |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------- | -------- |
| `isOpen`   | `is-open`  | Open or close the content      | `boolean`           | `false`  |
| `position` | `position` | The position of the side panel | `"left" \| "right"` | `'left'` |
